title: IsoCode Single-Cell Natural Killer: Human NK Cell Protocol
description: Access our IsoCode Single-Cell Natural Killer: Human NK Cell Protocol asset.
cleaned_text: We're excited to announce the combination of Berkeley Lights and IsoPlexis, bringing together the Beacon and IsoSpark platforms to form the premier functional cell biology company. Visit Site Get the most out of IsoPlexis' systems to rapidly generate useful data that relates to in vivo immune activity. We keep your personal information safe and do not share it with any third parties. By submitting this form, you agree to receive communications from IsoPlexis and accept our Privacy Policy.
